heading: Ring of Mendeln â€“ Diablo 4 Unique Item
content: Ring of Mendeln is a Necromancer Unique Ring that buffs Minions. Like all Unique items they provide a powerful effect that can't be found on any other item. These effects can't be moved around like resulting in limited flexibility when incorporating them into your build. Many Unique items change the way skills and builds work in significant ways. More info coming soon!
